alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 9:47PM PST until January 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...All of Lake County, and far eastern Klamath County near Winter Ridge. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts along Winter Ridge and other high elevations observation stations have even been gusting as high as 70 mph. These wind headlines are likely to be wrapped into the Winter Weather Advisory that starts at 4 AM. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Lake County; Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County
